product_desc: The product is to start up a social park that combines a farmer market with a social event. I am an engineer and I just purchased 18 acres in Collin County,TX with access to city water and electricity, however the purchase of the land and utilities leaves me in need of financial investment to finish my project in a timely manner. The end result will brings together an outdoor environment with sales of a wide range of agricultural  and aquaponic products  including fruits, veggies, fish, and poultry. The park will host events such as live music and social events to help people gather and build friendships along with buying their favorite products. I also plan on growing a fruit that is not widely available and with a lot of research it has been very helpful for diabetics. I want to offer it at a much more affordable price than current stores have.  I have a very big project in mind and would love to get in touch with someone that shares an interest in helping this project financially.
name: S&L Agra
